response.original_title: A Romantic Comedy Featuring Lara and Tobi
response.overview: Lara Thomas, a next gen PR guru is down on her luck when it comes to men. In fact, she can't stand the notion of love, and this is because of her ex-boyfriend, Tobi Okoye. A Tech Guru from a wealthy Nigerian family and the hottest bachelor currently in demand because he and his business partner just raised a whole ton of money.
response.title: A Romantic Comedy Featuring Lara and Tobi
